channel.title: Shop Error?
channel.description:
Ok I am using project czar source
but when i add an item in to an existing shop i get disconnected when i trade with the shop
what is wrong?
help thanks

item.title: Shop Error?
item.dc:creator: @runormal runormal
item.description:
@runormal wrote:

ok i didn’t explain that well i was in a rush let me do this proplerty

go to shops.cfg

shop = 49 Range Shop 2 2 859 100 861 100 853 100 1135 50 1099 50 1065 50 2501 50 2495 50 2489 50 2503 50 2497 50 2491 50 2487 50 2493 50 2499 50 892 10000 2577 50 2581 50 1052 15 15156 100
then take the last item, in this shops its object id 15156

highlifght the space, and 15156 and the 100

15156	100 then copy and paste paste it after the precvious oens

15156	100	15156	100

should look like that

change
15156 100 15156 100
to your item id, save and compile

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Error?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

No, you have to have spaces do when your on the line it shouldn’t have any lil space boxes the the whole space like here

|--------------------------|

“-” = The whole space
Copy and paste a line with none of the space boxes in the whole space.

Read full topic
